title: A bill to authorize the sale of certain National Forest System lands in the Superior National Forest in Minnesota.
content: Superior National Forest Land Adjustment Act of 2008 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture, after consideration of specified public interest factors, to sell certain lands in Superior National Forest in Minnesota. Requires: (1) consideration for a sale of lands to be not less than the appraised market value of those lands. And (2) the first offer for the sale of the lands under this Act to be made to Poly Met Mining, Inc.
